I was introduced by a friend to come here because they said the coffee and cakes are delicious. And she was right. The mochaccino I order was very well balanced and the lemon meringue tart complimented the coffee. And wow water is free!!!! The male barista gave me a good recommendation for coffee and cakes. I will definitely be back again!!!!

I‚Äôve been to this restaurant a few times, and the staff and food never fail to impress me. Today, I went for a birthday dinner with my friends, and Imah served us with such warmth and politeness‚Äîit truly made our day. On top of that, the food was absolutely delicious, and we had a fantastic time chatting while enjoying our meal. 10/10‚ÄîI‚Äôll definitely be coming back as soon as possible!

Always beating expectations. Constantly a pleasant dining experience, service is beyond magnificent, in particular Imah, who is always so welcoming and friendly towards every customer. Food is the main event, quality and taste maintained every time. Price is reasonable.
The service by Devi was amazing. Food and coffee good as well. Yuvonne make a best coffee for me as per my request.will come back again.
